name: DiffSense
tagline: Local AI git commit generator for Apple Silicon
description: DiffSense uses the native AFM 3B model on Apple Silicon to generate git commit messages for free. It runs locally with zero latency, ensuring your code stays private. Features customizable message styles and powerful alias macros.

name: ScreenREC
tagline: Free online screen recorder | no download required
description: üé¨ ScreenREC: The simplest screen recorder ever Record screen, webcam & audio in-browser‚Äîno downloads, no signups. Why teams love ScreenREC: ‚ú® Zero install, works instantly üîí Privacy-first, recordings stay local üé• Full HD quality ‚ö° One-click start üé® Dark mode UI üíæ Export MP4/WebM üåê 100% open source Perfect for tutorials, demos, bug reports, presentations & async team communication. No bloat. No tracking. Just recording done right.

name: Reddit Summarizer
tagline: Summarize long Reddit threads with one click
description: Some long reddit threads are a gold mine. But you need to dig deep in hundreds or thousands of comments to form the conclusion. To simplify that I automated it all in form of chrome extension with customization to fit your own needs. With one click it: - fetches metadata (with all comments) - cleans it - sends it to selected AI - gold, you are looking for Supported pages: - Threads - Subreddits - Search results

name: Dvina
tagline: Private AI that connects 120+ apps and your live databases
description: Meet Dvina: World's most connected, private and reliable AI platform. Unified for analyzing, creating and deciding with massive docs, real-time data and 120+ apps like Google, Notion, Linear, Jira, SAP, Salesforce.

name: Press Pitch
tagline: Generate a ready-to-send pitch for journalists in seconds.
description: Press Pitch is a free tool I built to help founders write a clear, ready-to-send pitch for journalists in seconds. We kept seeing founders get stuck staring at a blank page or overcomplicating their outreach. This tool fixes that. You answer a few simple questions and get a clean pitch you can copy, tweak, and send right away.

name: Buzz
tagline: Chat with your Meta Ads and ask anything about the campaigns
description: Connect your Meta Ads account to Buzz and start chatting with your data. Build marketing reports, get accurate answers to your questions without hours of manual work.

name: PurrrrrFocus Pomodoro
tagline: Turn focus into a delightful journey with cute cat companion
description: PurrrrrFocus transforms productivity into an engaging experience with 8 unique cat companions and elegant Chinese-inspired themes. Features flexible Pomodoro & count-up timers, comprehensive analytics, achievement system, and points store. Perfect for students, knowledge workers, and anyone building better focus habits. Beautiful design meets proven productivity methods.

name: Aureyl ‚Äì Personalized AI Vision Board
tagline: Science-backed AI vision board with you in your dream life
description: Most vision boards fail because your brain sees a stranger living your dream. Aureyl changes that. Using hyper-realistic AI, we place YOUR face into your future, whether it‚Äôs a corner office, a beach in Bali, or a fitness milestone. 1. Chat with our therapy-informed AI guide to uncover your true goals. 2. Upload a few selfies. 3. Get 20+ custom images of YOU in your dream life. Built with therapists to activate your brain‚Äôs natural goal-seeking system. Stop manifesting strangers‚Äô lives.

name: FinSight AI
tagline: Insightful knowledge yields dividends.
description: FinSight is a subscription service that analyzes market information to provide insight on publicly traded companies. Based on several metrics, FinSight will suggest the customer to buy, sell, or hold. Along with the recommendation, an in-depth explanation is provided. FinSight is significantly more inexpensive compared to other similar services.

name: Calltuv
tagline: Cheap international calls straight from your browser.
description: Make cheap international online calls to 200+ countries from your browser with CallTuv. Crystal clear quality, low rates, and no hidden fees. Try it now!

name: Shelfy
tagline: Smart reading tracker and fastest bookmarks
description: Shelfy solves a simple problem: most reading trackers slow you down, and note apps make it hard to keep your highlights and progress in one place. Shelfy keeps everything together while staying out of your way.

name: Twending
tagline: The best way to find brand new repositories on github
description: Twending is the best way to find new trending repositories on github.

name: SantaSpoilers
tagline: Keep the magic alive
description: Find out if movies and TV shows are safe to watch with kids who believe in Santa. Community-driven spoiler alerts help parents protect the magic of Christmas.

name: Stupid Easy Names
tagline: The easiest way to name your next project
description: Naming things is hard. We made it stupid easy. Get a mighty, dense, infinite grid of words you can choose from, combine and tweak. All free, no signup required.

name: Screenshot Composer
tagline: Compose Beautiful Sceenshots
description: Create beautiful screenshots with gradient backgrounds, customizable padding, shadows, and corner styling. 100% free and open source.

name: jot ‚Äî a terminal notebook
tagline: for thoughts you‚Äôre embarrassed to open Notion for.
description: Most note apps assume your thoughts are already clear. Mine usually aren‚Äôt. jot is a tiny CLI tool for capturing raw thoughts, half-ideas, and nonsense ‚Äî directly from your terminal. No tags. No folders. No setup. One notebook. Chronological. Local. You type. You press enter. You go back to work. Over time, patterns show up on their own. If you want a second brain, this isn‚Äôt it. If you want a place to be early, welcome.

name: Distraction Receipt
tagline: An honest receipt for your day.
description: Distraction Receipt is a quiet daily reflection tool. You write three things: What you intended to do What actually happened What you avoided The app turns that into a simple receipt for the day. No accounts. No streaks. No advice. Just an honest record of where your time went. Built to be calm, private, and a little confronting.

name: Sukoon
tagline: Find your inner peace
description: Sukoon is your peaceful productivity companion‚Äîrelaxing ambient sounds, Pomodoro sessions, and stopwatch tracking to help you work better and stay calm.

name: WanderChina.Guide
tagline: Your Ultimate Guide Travel China.
description: Wander China Guide is a website focused on introducing Chinese culture and tourism. Starting with Chinese culture, it offers various content guides to help you understand the real and beautiful China.

name: Need OnlineTools
tagline: Free web tools for count, convert, calculate & more
description: Find all web tools you need in one place. Use our free online tools to compress files, convert text or formats, digital tally counter, calculator and many more tools.
